abstract: What to do if you need to remove or change your stored credit card — or want to switch to a different payment method entirely.
snippet: What to do if you need to remove or change your stored credit card — or want to switch to a different payment method entirely.
lead_paragraph: Q. How do I delete the stored credit card from the Google Play store on my Android tablet and change it to a prepaid Google Play gift card?

headline.main: How to Change the Way You Pay in Google Play
